name: The Longest Walk (Endocrine/BAMSc, Marynator, superschlumpf21, Gellek, xdepRaven, missjeyjones, doodeldan26, Lerolan, FaktezZ)
name_original: The Longest Walk (Endocrine/BAMSc, Marynator, superschlumpf21, Gellek, xdepRaven, missjeyjones, doodeldan26, Lerolan, FaktezZ)
description:
THE LONGEST WALK

The Dude wants to get home before drunkenly falling asleep.

Space to Jump. B to blink.

Try to pick up the coke.

Picking up beer or pillows making you tired even faster.
